author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Vadipatti police have arrested a man from Batlagundu in connection with the murder of his wife, whose body was thrown into the Vaigai river.

The police said that the body was found concealed in a gunny bag in the Vaigai river on Wednesday evening. With the suspicion that the body could have been thrown into the river in the upstream, the police started to look for missing persons in Dindigul district.

The woman was identified as Pandeeswari, wife of M. Alagar, of Kannan Nagar in Batlagundu.
title: Man arrested for wife’s murder
